infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: This app uses notification to remind you to record your weight and food.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to take photos of their food for tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to the photo library for choosing images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to log where you consumed the food.
